item.title: DiscoReel
item.description: DiscoReel (Discovering Relevant Dimensions in Epidemic Dynamics for Data-Efficient Predictive Modeling) receives funding from the French National Research Agency (ANR) under the Young Researcher (JCJC) research scheme to Eugenio Valdano. The project has to start yet. Will start some time in yearly 2026.

item.title: PP-IMPACT
item.description:
PP-IMPACT (Improving PrEP policies for MSM in Portugal and France through causal analysis and data-driven modeling) receives funding from the French agency for research in HIV/AIDS, viral hepatitis, sexually transmitted infections, tuberculosis and emerging and re-emerging infectious diseases (ANRS-MIE). The project has to start yet. Will start some time in late 2025. The project is a consortium of

  • INSERM (Eugenio Valdano coordinator, Charles Assaad partner),
  • University of Lisbon (Paula Meireles),
  • Northeastern University London (Sofia Teixeira).

item.title: SIESTA
item.description: SIESTA (Secure Interactive Environments for SensiTive Data Analytics) receives funding from the European Union’s Horizon Europe research and innovation programme under grant agreement No. 101131957.
